Key Match Events: Craig Kimbrel's performance issues in Games 3 and 4, including walk-off single by Ketel Marte and a game-tying two-run homer by Alek Thomas.
Diamondbacks' walk-off wins in Game 3 and Game 4.
Pre-Game Insights: Phillies had a strong start in the playoffs, defeating Marlins and Braves before facing Diamondbacks.
Phillies dominated the first two games of the NLCS, outscoring Diamondbacks 15-3.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed optimism about the team's future and mentioned the ownership and Dave Dombrowski's role in building the roster.
Phillies' offensive struggles in the final two games, going 11-for-63 with only two hits in 17 at-bats with runners in scoring position.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phillies' potential future moves with Aaron Nola and Rhys Hoskins as free agents.
Phillies' investment in high-profile players since Dave Dombrowski took over.
Others: MLB news and links mentioned in the article.
